name: chat-app
description: A chat application using the MERN stack and Socket.io

scripts.install-deps: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.start-project: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node app.js
